description: Phase enabling the operator to verify successful completion of dispensing and addition of selected Bill of Material line items at recipe runtime and to display their status in the Electronic Batch Record.
intent: To help users verify that selected BoM line items have been dispensed and/or added to the batch within configured tolerance levels before proceeding.

inputs.BOMLineItems: DataTable of selected BoM items with required quantities

outputs.BOMVerificationStatus: DataTable with columns ITEM, QUANTITY, UOM, STATUS

preconditions: Phase configured by recipe author at edit stage to enable BoM validation
Central dispense line items exist for dispense check
postconditions: EBR data lines indicate completion status of each selected BoM line item
side_effects: Phase does not autocomplete if any BoM item is outside tolerance or incomplete
example_usage: Operator executes the Check BOM phase, reviews the displayed line items and their completion statuses, and confirms to proceed if all items are within tolerance.
